metadata.title: CVE-2017-17521 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: uiutil.c in FontForge through 20170731 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-17534.

criterions.comment: fontforge: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
